resources.string:
"
Use \$generate to generate contacts with an specific range. see \$help --generate " "for more details.
Use \$cancel to cancel current working job.
Use $clean to remove all of your contacts. be careful using it.
" "This app is not designed for noobs :). So it won't request you to give Contacts permission. you have to do it manually.
"

"
Use this format to generate contacts:
" "$generate +[Country Code] [number with spaces] to [Country Code] [number with spaces]
" "like: $generate +98 935 123 4567 to +98 935 123 5698" "note that any differences in numbers format lead to invalid command error." "limit: only last part of numbers should be different."
